name: Player Accurate Battleground
description:
PABG - the last battle-battle!

PABG was originally made as a parody of the April fools in the genre of Battle Royal. Jump to the island with flying trucks, find the gun and survive, and look stupid, doing this, find and eliminate all your enemies to win the round!
Choose yourself a character from red or blue, and jump to the island to win this game.
Stay alive, only 1 player out of 100 can.
It all starts very simply, you have limited time, you need to survive in the location.

FUNCTIONS:

- Huge map
- Based on physics ALL
